availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James P. Robinson (Captain in the 55th Kentucky Mounted Infantry)

body.p: A Kentucky soldier. Served as a captain in the 55th Kentucky Mounted Infantry (Co. C) from November 1864 to September 1865.

bibl.p: James P. Robinson, 55th Kentucky Mounted Infantry, Compiled Service Record, (https://www.fold3.com/image/232320212) (accessed on May 5, 2017); Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866),555;
